title: Darkstream tonight
author: VD
content_html:
I’ll be doing a Darkstream tonight at 7 PM Eastern on Periscope. But I won’t doing one on Periscope Monday night. I’ll be doing one on GabTV, at the same time, instead.

UPDATE: The replay is here.
